meanings.sent1: She postered her room with colorful posters of her favorite bands.
meanings.sent2: The school postered the walls with educational posters.
meanings.sent3: He postered the hallway with so many posters that it looked like a museum!
meanings.sent4: The city postered the streets with event posters, creating a vibrant atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: Postering the walls with motivational posters can inspire students to work harder.
